verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Every praise is to our God
Every word of worship
With one accord
â€¦ Every praise every praise

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Is to our God (is to our god)
Sing hallelujah
To our god
Glory hallelujah
Is due our God
Every praise every praise is to our God.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
God my Savior
God my Healer
God my Deliverer
Yes He is, yes He is
